category: news
title: "AWS and SK Telecom Collaborate to Co-Develop Computer Vision AI Services"
excerpt: "Amazon Web Services (AWS), an Amazon.com company (NASDAQ: AMZN), and SK Telecom, the information and communications technology arm of SK Group, the second largest conglomerate in Korea, today announced at Mobile World Congress (MWC) Las Vegas that the two companies will co-develop a new set of computer vision services."
